name: akamaicachepurge
description: Purge content cache at the Akamai Edge using Fast Purge API
helpMarkDown: For aditional information and support please refer to <https://github.com/dmitryserbin/azdev-akamai-cache-purge> project repository
author: Dmitry Serbin

inputs.name: edgegridEndpoint
inputs.label: Akamai EdgeGrid endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select service endpoint for Akamai EdgeGrid connection

inputs.name: network
inputs.label: Target network name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target Akamai network name (i.e. `staging` or `production`)

inputs.name: purgeType
inputs.label: Purge type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Type to perform content purging by

- `url` - purge by URL
- `cpCode` - purge by CP Code

inputs.name: purgeMethod
inputs.label: Purge method
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Method to perform content purging by

- `Delete` - selecting this method means the content that is currently in Akamaiâ€™s edge server caches is never served.
- `Invalidate` - Select this method to mark the cached content as invalid

inputs.name: urls
inputs.label: Target URLs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target Akamai-hosted URLs to purge cache (example `https://time.akau.devops.akademo.it/one`, wildcards are not supported)

validation.message: That does not appear to be a valid URL

inputs.name: cpCodes
inputs.label: Target CP Codes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target Akamai-hosted CP Codes to purge cache (example `123456`, wildcards are not supported)

validation.message: That does not appear to be a valid CP Code, please use numbers only
